website_summaries.verdict: With crystal-clear instructions, this system is a great pick for beginners. Just know that you're not getting any seeds or nutrients for your water.
pros: Includes container, air pump, tubes, airstone, rockwool, clay pebbles, and water indicator
Comes with great instructions that make it easy for beginners
cons: Does not include nutrients for your water reservoir or any seeds
Water-level indicator may leak a bit

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little setup
customer_reviews.text: This is my first DWC and it is awesome. Had it set up and running in just a few minutes. My California tomatoes love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rollo

customer_reviews.title: Written instructions
customer_reviews.text: The package was delivered on time. The wife was interested in your kit. When she went to open it & put it together she could not do it. I ended up put it together based on the drawing that was sent. There was no additional info/instruction booklet sent in. Not everybody is internet savvy! There was no instructions as to what to do with the clay stones and what type of fertilizer to use, etc . Some how we managed to make the system work an we are happy to report that several seeds are growing.
customer_reviews.author: Luis G Torres

customer_reviews.title: very small , but it has everything your need , good for person that just curious
customer_reviews.text: For starter it is good. the hole and the side gadget for water level is very poorly design , leaking continuesly even with the glue etc, end up just closing the hole
customer_reviews.author: lita budiamal mathai

customer_reviews.title: Best price avay
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with the rockwool media as shown but they more than made uo for it with an additional 6 net pots and a spare sight tube w/fittings. Good solid dwc setup. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: PopeWeazl

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with what I got
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try out Hydroponics for a while now. Decided to give it a try and came across this kit and, so far, I am happy with what I got. It came with a complete kit to start and a beginner's guide which is exactly what I need! Looking forward to this new adventure.
customer_reviews.author: Denzel

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Deep Water Culture Grow System
customer_reviews.text: I like that this DWC system came with everything that I would need to get started. Setup is quick and easy although the installation of the water level indicator may leave some people confused, it's pretty easy once you check out a quick video or look at the instructions for awhile. Everything has been water tight and these buckets work great. I transferred some plants from another DWC system that was running out of room and planted some seeds in the included rockwool. I'll see how well the rockwool works in the next couple of weeks. There's still a need for plant light (unless you're using natural light) and nutrients, but these will vary based on your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Diacis

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm.
customer_reviews.text: Overall after only having it for 48 hours I'm not impressed. The first time I tried to adjust the air stone it broke immediately. Plus the air pump gets super hot. And the air stone that is as advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Thisguy

customer_reviews.title: Item not able to be used as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Products in great according to the ad. However the field to measure up in person. The instructions that came with it were extremely vague and consisted of a picture diagram and a list of parts, no instructions of how to properly set up step-by-step. Fairly simple set up though it looks like, so was able to piece it together in a matter of minutes. However upon filling the reservoir, I noticed a pretty bad leak. This item is not able to be utilized in which it was manufactured. Seriously and strongly do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: The kit came with everything you need to start growing! I did have a few questions, but they were quick to respond with helpful answers.
customer_reviews.author: jLouro

customer_reviews.title: DWC hydroponics
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for my grandson. I would like for him to get started with hydroponic gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive ad, one of the worst I've seen on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: No seeds or nutrients arrived with this kit, and on the product content desription, a star indicated that seeds only were included with the "kit," which had been described in the Amazon ad as a "starter kit." The darn thing takes a lot of time to assemble, which made me very angry with Savvy Grow, as I expect it will take equal time to re-package and return. A pox upon Savvy Grow!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerJan Koltun

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Small easy to setup. I did add a grow light because it is away from sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: macs

customer_reviews.title: Not quite up to snuff
customer_reviews.text: For 50$, I expected a little more. The container looks hand made or hand done .. and the holes aren't really are cut with a clean bit. The air stone was cheap and fell apart after first use. It's a cheap pump too. Does it work sure .. you'll need a new air stone! So I didn't want to make it, but I could have and done it cleaner and probably cheaper. But I was hoping for $50 I would save that time and have something I needed, but it didn't quite meet those expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Akita

customer_reviews.title: DWC Hydroponic System Growing Kit -
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made, assembles very easy, fast shipping. This unit is for growing herbs etc. If you want to grow tomatoes you will want to purchase a much larger unit like a 5 gallon bucket size. I expect this unit to last for many years. I highly recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: HalibutZach

customer_reviews.title: This is almost perfect, if you have the space
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need in one package. The only thing missing is the light source. If you live in a small apartment this will take up too much space. If you live in a dark apartment this will not work either. It's well put together but for folks in small (or dark) spaces, this is not the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The bin looks nice and seems of good quality. Unfortunately, it was not clear from the instruction how to assemble everything and I had to cut a piece of tube to connect the tube to the oxygen machine. There are no instructions how to grow plants - on the blog it is not exactly stated. Have to try on my own and to adjust the grow lights (bought seperately) and the oxygen machine. Update: I have an Aerogarden and the plants are growing great without any problems, but with this set all my plants' roots are rotting even I have changed the water regularly. I wish that I have spend the 50$ on an Aerogarden instead on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Size and materials are great for kitchen or inside classroom
customer_reviews.text: This little hydroponics set-up and great for indoors- and easy to assemble and also to put away. I have not tried it yet, but know that it will be much better than all the other stuff I had. It is more flexible than those with pods, and can keep larger plants alive. Also not a hassle to put away since it comes apart to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been fascinated with the idea behind hydrophonics and this is my first venture into this new world. No messy soil and I love that I set it up and leave it as usually with plants I forget to water them. None of that problem with this kit and I now have herbs growing in my kitchen window!
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Impressions of a novice
customer_reviews.text: 3 weeks: Easy set up. Easy to rinse and change out the nutrient solution. I'm hoping to add an aquarium pump to making things even easier!
customer_reviews.author: John M. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: Opened this product immediately upon arrival to find numerous rubber gaskets, never mentioned in the original advertising. No explanation as to their need and no apparent instructions on how to use them. Product arrived with 13 clay stones in a bag. Not enough to hold up even one plant. Inferior quality all around,.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Billings

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Leaks. One and done, moving on to different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Nora McDonald

customer_reviews.title: i thought  there would be 2 pumps
customer_reviews.text: then i looked a bit more carefully to see the ONE air pump with TWO tube openings. so you have to set the two tubs up so both tubs reach ONE AIR PUMP.......i'm ok with that. i have an extra pump. just wanted to let others know...TWO TUBS...ONE AIR PUMP FOR BOTH....otherwise, it seems like it will work. will fill up tomorrow..
customer_reviews.author: FAB

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this method.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this really works or not. On my second try. First failed miserable. So far new seeds are growing. Was so excited about this method because where we live nothing much will grow and wanted to get into hydraponics. Will keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L

customer_reviews.title: overpriced by a mile
customer_reviews.text: over priced and underwhelmed. $20 you could make sonething 3 times the size.
customer_reviews.author: James Wood

customer_reviews.title: THis is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I have never done hydroponics before so setting it up was a challenge BUT once you look at a few YouTube videos you can easily figure it out. The actual product is great. Im really pleased with it. The company was easy to get a hold of and get help from.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stachelski

customer_reviews.title: It follows the basic hydroponics
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic system you could put together with some simple aquarium gear so maybe buy the stuff yourself. The bubble stone disintegrated and broke in half, the pump is a cheap 10gallon aquarium pump that rattles so yea
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the Rockwool!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, and about 6X less than an Aerogarden, $30 LED and all, BUT they are still using that very dangerous, asbestos like Rockwool, be very careful when breaking it off, you do NOT want to breathe that poison into your lungs!
customer_reviews.author: bvs1216

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to put together, only problem was water level tube was a little long had to cut it. Air stone is garbage buy a different one!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is growing
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a light, nutrients, seeds, etc and still nothing is growing. I’m bummed out
customer_reviews.author: Kat Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great set-up
customer_reviews.text: I am appreciating the simplicity of this system. It was affordable and my little sprouts are growing. I did purchase grow lights for it, but it is a great size and value.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Rock wool
customer_reviews.text: When you put rock wool in the 2" holding basket it moves to loosely and the Rock wool turns over and Dumps out the seed needs bigger Size of rock wool
customer_reviews.author: Mo Mo

customer_reviews.title: A Great Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: I was very interested in Hydroponic but was confused on what materials I needed to start off with. This wonderful compact kit has everything you need to get started. It's very simple to set up and get going, I would suggest they have more information on what is best to start growing in this system.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump Broken on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but terribly cheap. Pump did not work so I had to replace pump. For the $$ they need to include better pump. Also I bout the “kit” and did not receive seeds. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boone

customer_reviews.title: New Users Review
customer_reviews.text: I’m starting tomato, lettuce and pepper plants. The seeds haven’t sprouted yet. The instructions should be updated to reflect the new air stone that came with it. Would also be nice is there was a mark for where the waterline is when it’s up to the bottom of the baskets. The only problem I had was that the hole for the air hose was not there. I just had to drill my own.
customer_reviews.author: R. Como

customer_reviews.title: Not good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come as a complete starter set. Poor directions. Everything we tried to grow died.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got the kit and i'm digging it. Everything came as described. Looking forward to this hydro journey!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: All good except the air stone
customer_reviews.text: I liked this when I first got it 3 days ago. Today when I plugged it in there was a lot of splashing. When I lifted the top I saw the stone was broken. It’s too expensive to only last 2-3 days. Update: the company stares they will send a replacement stone. I will give a further review when the stone arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Lory

customer_reviews.title: Great started out at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect kit with everything I need to get my seedlings. The company has a web site with tutorials that gave me even more ideas.I'm looking forward to my head found salads.
customer_reviews.author: C HELMS

customer_reviews.title: This is a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I have been using it for a little over 8 weeks now, and it works so good I had to buy another a couple of weeks ago! Only thing I would change are the rock wool cubes. Mine broke apart and I ended up having to buy some more, and I bought bigger ones. The ones provided are not big enough for the net pots. Other than that, awesome product! When I expand a little more I plan on buying some more of these!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bach

customer_reviews.title: Cheap/previously opened
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty cheap materials and the one that was sent to me was clearly opened previously and half assembled. The topper is that the previous purchaser tried to remove all the stickers, unsuccessfully. You could probably make this kit yourself for $20
customer_reviews.author: Grrrr

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly cut top holes. elbow joints leak. Air stone fell apart once it got wet. Material's used, maybe worth $25. I believe I can do a better job, putting one together from items found on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my kitchen herbs! Easy to setup and use. Well made. Company provides good customer service. The airstone in my kit was defective. I contacted them and they asked for a picture and then sent me a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina R. Cacciapaglia

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I loved the ease of putting together per instructions. I bought the little hydrophobic system to start seeds. The very first time I have been successful after years of trying!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not woth a penny
customer_reviews.text: Thie product do not work my pump never produce any oxygen or bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: An honest company with a good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and when I had a problem with anything the company made good and fixed it right away and the only problem I had was the plug for the air pump was different than my sockets and tgey sent a new pump right out for free. The set up works great now.
customer_reviews.author: Dthornton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing growing tub!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and set it up. Planted lettuce and Kale. Amazing little product! I ordered another one to do cucumbers and tomatoes in. I compared them to the Kratky method of putting your plants in a jar, and the hydroponic planter has far bypassed the growth from Kratky method. Highly recommend this product to the house hold growing products indoors
customer_reviews.author: Kelly From Battle Ground Washingtpn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work get something better
customer_reviews.text: I take back everything I said about this product it sucks don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Hydroponic system grow kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with my purchase. I got what I expected and my plants are doing pretty well so far. I am pleased
customer_reviews.author: C.Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good kit - doesn't include seeds
customer_reviews.text: The kit is good - but I was surprised it didn't contain seeds. It clearly DOES NOT say it has seeds, but can be easily misread to think it does. They should sell it with seeds and fertilizer.
customer_reviews.author: Harold McKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble! I was surprised at how quiet the motor for the air stone is. Was nicely package and arrived quickly. I am so excited and can't wait to watch the plants grow. This is my first hydroponic kit and I'm sure it will not be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Second time buyer, some nice improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first one about 8 months ago - the airstone stopped working after 3 months. Replaced that with a GOOD one from the aquarium store for about $5. Nice to see you are now shipping the new ones with a quality airstone! Also, the airstone tubing access being drilled in the side rather than the lid is a stroke of genius! (Did the same to my old one.)
customer_reviews.author: jz in florida

customer_reviews.title: Poor to no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Very poor instructions and difficult to follow. I guessed at most. Definitely for the beginner as advertised. Some stuff I never did figure out how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Simple DWC with a great reservoir/net cups/and air stone(I really like the flat blue one)
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The setup was pretty easy, but could use some written instructions as opposed to just pictures, as other reviewers have said. I haven’t had any trouble with the air stone breaking or any leaks, so that’s good! But I also haven’t had much growth yet (that’s probably on my end, I’m a beginner).
customer_reviews.author: killian

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: Love the colorful yet minimalistic design. I got a follow up e-mall and between that and the instructions on the website it was pretty easy to set up. I’m so excited to grow my own food!
customer_reviews.author: J.C

customer_reviews.title: Love this system!
customer_reviews.text: love it! I have basil allready sprouting. I do have on heating mat. ordered ph kit and nutrients for the plants. I am hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: The pots are very tiny , not suitable for growing any plants.
customer_reviews.text: The pots are way tinier which makes it harder to hold any plants straight. As the plants will grow there is no support for the plants to remain steady.
customer_reviews.author: Partha

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Love it , had large Hydro system before and this one is just as good at a smaller level. Anyone who has a problem with this set up is an idiot!
customer_reviews.author: Bull Huber

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: provided installation guide and tips was very helpful in getting you up and running in no time Especially installation/instruction that came in the follow up email was very detailed and helpful
customer_reviews.author: Dilani

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble (just using the instructions on SavvyGrow's website) and all seems well so far. Of course, time will tell whether it is a good product once the plants grow - but so far I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Our first hydroponics
customer_reviews.text: We like it BUT is a lot smaller than what we expected. We have kale, Swiss chard in the system.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Product is made with low quality parts
customer_reviews.text: the fittings are not tight enough to avoid leaks, air stone broke during assembly. I am a professional microgreen and lettuce grower and thought this unit might be a good counter top lettuce provider. had to use flex seal to attempt leak prevension, no luck. poorly engineered and flawed concept.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Good starter system!
customer_reviews.text: Working nice and smooth so far(2weeks). Instructions came later but we figured /researched things out on our own. Nice little hobby system, fun to watch lettuce grow.
customer_reviews.author: Orsolya S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Good product.. Exactly as described and overall it is a decent value. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dealmaker74

customer_reviews.title: Missing part.
customer_reviews.text: What do I do if I did not get the air stone or the tube
customer_reviews.author: insanity

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly easy planting
customer_reviews.text: We love it and are considering ordering another one they are so easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: allwayslate

customer_reviews.title: Actually got things to grow.
customer_reviews.text: Having fun with trying to grow things. Seems to be working. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Its an good product smaller that what it looks likebin the picture buts it ok for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Donovan b

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Set up in less than 5 minutes. Can't wait to see the results. Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It comes with everything that you need,very easy set up. Seller helps you if you need.
customer_reviews.author: Kuku 808

customer_reviews.title: Nice Starter Kit.
customer_reviews.text: Use this kit to start young plant before placing in my drip bucket system. works great on small plants just starting to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Erne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO happy with this product as well as the customer service of this company. Definitely recommend!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to watch the instruction video on the website for set up. Made it a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Nice system
customer_reviews.text: The seeds sprouted right away! So nice I bought 2!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Sams

customer_reviews.title: [updated]missing a net cup.
customer_reviews.text: There are only 5 net cups, but not 6 in box. Received another two cups. Strawberries are doing well with the system.
customer_reviews.author: likezhangyy

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Like that the online video helped with set up. Dislike that I needed to find my own nutrients to add.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Fox

customer_reviews.title: Everything seems to be in order
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, can't wait to use it! Looks like all the parts are there. This will be my first DWC.
customer_reviews.author: Michalina Lee

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Planted my Blueberry kush a few days ago. SavvyGrow is working on just as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My plants love this system!
customer_reviews.text: This is great system! It’s easy to use, doesn’t leak, and my plants are growing wonderfully!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndal Grant

customer_reviews.title: I Really Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. I was up and running within a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: TrueReader

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, then only check once a day!
customer_reviews.text: My basil has really started to sprout in their new environment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for tomato jump starting
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I used this to start tomato seedlings. The seeds mature very fast and after only a couple weeks are strong and healthy enough for transplant outside. I used this system to jump start a variety of vegetables. This system saves time, money, and effort. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Escalona

product_meta.title: DWC Hydroponic System Growing Kit - Large Airstone, 6 Sites Bucket with Air Pump - Complete Hydroponics Indoor Herb Garden Starter Kit for Kitchen - Grow Super Fast
feature_bullets: ✔ EASY USE, COMPLETE KIT… everything you need to grow your own organic food & herbs, includes airstone, rockwool, powerful air pump & medium sized DWC bucket, water indicator, assemble instructions, tube & clay pebble
✔ 3-5 TIMES FASTER THAN SOIL…our hydroponic growing kit creates big plants, fast; their roots get full nourishment without searching soil for it. The perfect indoor herb garden kit
✔ PERFECT FOR BEGINNERS & SCHOOLS with E-BOOK… this is one of the best hydroponic system kits for those starting out as indoor vegetable growers, or for children & teachers doing projects in class
✔ BRING THE GARDEN INDOORS…avoid bad weather, acid rich soils, slugs and pests by growing healthy fresh herbs, salads, veggies, flowers & fruits. Ideal for lovers of organic food
✔ FRESH & GOOD FOR YA… get full-power health benefits from your homegrown food; it keeps its vitamins, tastes better & unlike shop veg, hasn’t travelled far. Go organic & show folks the way!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars159 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
